 FUNCTION FNC_GAP_NIIM_GET_REPORT_QUERY(INPAR_ID NUMBER)RETURN VARCHAR2 AS
 VAR_SELECT VARCHAR2(30000);
 VAR_PIVOT VARCHAR2(30000);
 
BEGIN

SELECT WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(TIME_PERIOD)  into VAR_PIVOT   FROM 
(SELECT DISTINCT  TIME_PERIOD  || ' AS "x' || TIME_PERIOD ||'"' AS TIME_PERIOD FROM TBL_GAP_NIIM_PROFILE_DETAIL WHERE REPREQ = INPAR_ID and SENS_TYPE=0 and time_period is not null ORDER BY TIME_PERIOD);

SELECT WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(TIME_PERIOD)  into VAR_SELECT   FROM 
(SELECT DISTINCT   '  nvl("x' || TIME_PERIOD ||'",0)  AS "x' || TIME_PERIOD ||'"' AS TIME_PERIOD  FROM TBL_GAP_NIIM_PROFILE_DETAIL WHERE REPREQ = INPAR_ID and SENS_TYPE=0 and  time_period is not null ORDER BY TIME_PERIOD);

-- SELECT DISTINCT   TIME_PERIOD  , PERIOD_NAME FROM TBL_GAP_NIIM_PROFILE_DETAIL WHERE REPREQ = INPAR_ID ORDER BY TIME_PERIOD;


return
'
SELECT NAME as "text",
LEDGER_CODE as "code",MODALITY_TYPE as "type", '||VAR_SELECT||', parent as "parent",
sens_type as "sensType",tasir_name as "tasirName" FROM (
SELECT NAME,
parent,
LEDGER_CODE,
BALANCE,
TIME_PERIOD,
MODALITY_TYPE,
sens_type,
tasir_name
FROM TBL_GAP_NIIM_PROFILE_DETAIL WHERE REPREQ = '||INPAR_ID||' AND MODALITY_TYPE IN (1,2)  )
PIVOT (SUM(BALANCE) FOR TIME_PERIOD IN ( '||VAR_PIVOT||'))

union

SELECT NAME as "text",
LEDGER_CODE as "code",MODALITY_TYPE as "type", '||VAR_SELECT||', parent as "parent",sens_type as "sensType" ,tasir_name as "tasirName"  FROM (
SELECT NAME,
parent,
LEDGER_CODE,
BALANCE,
TIME_PERIOD,
MODALITY_TYPE,
sens_type,
tasir_name
FROM TBL_GAP_NIIM_PROFILE_DETAIL WHERE REPREQ =  '||INPAR_ID||'  AND MODALITY_TYPE IN (111,211)   )
PIVOT (SUM(BALANCE) FOR TIME_PERIOD IN ('||VAR_PIVOT||'))



union
SELECT NAME as "text", 
LEDGER_CODE as "code",MODALITY_TYPE as "type", '||VAR_SELECT||',"parent",sens_type as "sensType"  ,tasir_name as "tasirName" FROM (
SELECT NAME,
parent  as "parent",
LEDGER_CODE,
BALANCE,
TIME_PERIOD,
MODALITY_TYPE,
parent,
sens_type,
tasir_name
FROM TBL_GAP_NIIM_PROFILE_DETAIL WHERE parent is not null and REPREQ =  '||INPAR_ID||'  )
PIVOT (SUM(BALANCE) FOR TIME_PERIOD IN ('||VAR_PIVOT||'))


UNION 


SELECT   NAME as "text",1 as "code" , MODALITY_TYPE as "type", '||VAR_SELECT||',"parent" ,sens_type as "sensType" ,tasir_name as "tasirName" 
FROM (
SELECT ''NO_NAME'' as name,
max(parent)  as "parent",
SUM(BALANCE) AS BALANCE,
TIME_PERIOD,
 MODALITY_TYPE,
 sens_type,
 tasir_name
 FROM TBL_GAP_NIIM_PROFILE_DETAIL WHERE REPREQ =   '||INPAR_ID||'  AND MODALITY_TYPE IN (11,21)  GROUP BY MODALITY_TYPE,TIME_PERIOD,sens_type,tasir_name )
PIVOT (SUM(BALANCE) FOR TIME_PERIOD IN ('||VAR_PIVOT||'))


ORDER BY "type","sensType"';




 
END;

 FUNCTION FNC_GAP_NIIM_GET_DETAIL_TIMING(INPAR_ID NUMBER)RETURN VARCHAR2 AS
 VAR_SELECT VARCHAR2(30000);

BEGIN


return 'SELECT DISTINCT    ''x''||TIME_PERIOD "value"  , PERIOD_NAME "header" FROM TBL_GAP_NIIM_PROFILE_DETAIL WHERE REPREQ = '||INPAR_ID||' and sens_type = 0  and TIME_PERIOD is not null and PERIOD_NAME is not null ORDER BY "value"';

END;

 PROCEDURE PRC_GAP_NIIM_taAhodi_VALUE AS
 VAR_DATE   DATE;
 VAR_MAX    DATE;
BEGIN

execute immediate 'truncate table TBL_GAP_NIIM_VALUE';

 SELECT /*+ PARALLEL(auto)   */
   case when MAX(TRUNC(DUE_DATE) ) is null then trunc(sysdate) else MAX(TRUNC(DUE_DATE) ) end
 INTO
  VAR_MAX
 FROM TBL_VALUE_temp;

 VAR_DATE   := SYSDATE;
 
 LOOP
  INSERT /*+ APPEND PARALLEL(auto)   */ INTO TBL_GAP_NIIM_VALUE ( TYPE,GAP_RATE,EFF_DATE ) ( SELECT
   ID
  ,RATE
  ,DT
  FROM (
    SELECT /*+  PARALLEL(auto)   */
     REF_MODALITY_TYPE as id
    ,ROUND(
      SUM(BALANCE) / 30
     ,2
     ) as rate
     ,DUE_DATE
    FROM TBL_VALUE_temp
    WHERE DUE_DATE BETWEEN TRUNC(VAR_DATE) AND TRUNC(VAR_DATE + 30)
     AND
      REF_MODALITY_TYPE IN (
       11,21
      ) AND TBL_VALUE_TEMP.REF_TYPE NOT IN (40,3,7,15,41,31,21,55,10,1)
    GROUP BY
     REF_MODALITY_TYPE,DUE_DATE
   )
  ,    (
    SELECT /*+  PARALLEL(auto)   */
     TRUNC(VAR_DATE - 1 + ROWNUM) DT
    FROM DUAL
    CONNECT BY
     ROWNUM < 31
   ) where dt<= DUE_DATE 
  );

  COMMIT;
  VAR_DATE   := VAR_DATE + 30;
  EXIT WHEN trunc(VAR_DATE) > trunc(VAR_MAX);
 END LOOP;

END PRC_GAP_NIIM_taAhodi_VALUE;

 PROCEDURE PRC_GAP_NIIM_tasir_hasasiat  (
  INPAR_ID_REPORT   IN VARCHAR2
  , VAR_REPREQ   IN VARCHAR2
   ,ID_TIMING in varchar2
  
 ) as 
   var_2111_nabashe number;
     VAR_QUERY     VARCHAR2(4000);
     DATE_TYPE1 date;

 BEGIN



 for i in (

select * from ( select 1 as "type" ,regexp_substr(str, '[^,]+', 1, 1) as name, 
       regexp_substr(str, '[^,]+', 1, 2) as rate
       from (select regexp_substr (FIRST_DATE, '[^#]+',1, rownum) str
from tbl_report where ID = INPAR_ID_REPORT
connect by level <= regexp_count (FIRST_DATE, '[^#]+')))  where name is not null ) loop
 
 
  INSERT /*+ APPEND PARALLEL(auto)   */ INTO TBL_GAP_NIIM_PROFILE_DETAIL (
   NAME
  ,REF_REPORT
  ,REPREQ
  ,LEDGER_CODE
  ,BALANCE
  ,TIME_PERIOD
  ,MODALITY_TYPE
  ,SENS_TYPE
  ,TASIR_NAME
  ) SELECT /*+  PARALLEL(auto)   */
   (
    SELECT
     NAME
    FROM TBL_LEDGER
    WHERE TBL_LEDGER.LEDGER_CODE   = REF_LEGER_CODE
   )
  ,INPAR_ID_REPORT
  ,VAR_REPREQ
  ,REF_LEGER_CODE
  ,SUM(ABS( case when REF_CUr_ID <> 4 then BALANCE + (BALANCE * i.rate) else BALANCE end ) )
  ,REF_TIMING_ID
  ,MAX(REF_MODALITY_TYPE)
  ,1
  ,i.name
  FROM TBL_VALUE_TEMP
  WHERE REF_MODALITY_TYPE IN (
    1,2
   ) AND TBL_VALUE_TEMP.REF_TYPE NOT IN (40,3,7,15,41,31,21,55,10,1)
  GROUP BY
   REF_TIMING_ID
  ,REF_LEGER_CODE;

  COMMIT;
  INSERT /*+ APPEND PARALLEL(auto)   */ INTO TBL_GAP_NIIM_PROFILE_DETAIL (
   NAME
  ,REF_REPORT
  ,REPREQ
  ,LEDGER_CODE
  ,BALANCE
  ,TIME_PERIOD
  ,MODALITY_TYPE
  ,SENS_TYPE
  ,TASIR_NAME
  ) SELECT /*+  PARALLEL(auto)   */
   (
    SELECT
     NAME
    FROM TBL_LEDGER
    WHERE TBL_LEDGER.LEDGER_CODE   = REF_LEGER_CODE
   )
  ,INPAR_ID_REPORT
  ,VAR_REPREQ
  ,REF_LEGER_CODE
  ,SUM(ABS( case when REF_CUr_ID <> 4 then BALANCE + (BALANCE * i.rate) else BALANCE end ) )
  ,REF_TIMING_ID
  ,MAX(REF_MODALITY_TYPE)
  ,1
  ,i.name
  FROM TBL_VALUE_TEMP
  WHERE REF_MODALITY_TYPE IN (
    11,21
   ) AND TBL_VALUE_TEMP.REF_TYPE NOT IN (40,3,7,15,41,31,21,55,10,1)
  GROUP BY
   REF_TIMING_ID
  ,REF_LEGER_CODE
;
  COMMIT;
  
  
  
  --=================
  
   INSERT /*+ APPEND PARALLEL(auto)   */
INTO TBL_GAP_NIIM_PROFILE_DETAIL
  (
   
    name,
    REF_REPORT,
    REPREQ,
    PARENT,
    SENS_TYPE
      ,TASIR_NAME
  )
  VALUES
  (
    
    ' '
    ,INPAR_ID_REPORT
  ,VAR_REPREQ
    ,0
    ,1
      ,i.name
  );
  
  commit;
  --================
  
    INSERT /*+ APPEND PARALLEL(auto)   */
INTO TBL_GAP_NIIM_PROFILE_DETAIL
  (
   
    name,
    REF_REPORT,
    REPREQ,
    PARENT,
    SENS_TYPE
    ,TASIR_NAME
  )
  VALUES
  (
    
    ''
    ,INPAR_ID_REPORT
  ,VAR_REPREQ
    ,1
    ,1
     ,i.name
   
  );
  
  commit;
  
  
  --================
  
  
  
  
  
  
  UPDATE TBL_GAP_NIIM_PROFILE_DETAIL GNPD SET GNPD.PERIOD_NAME = 
(
SELECT TBL_TIMING_PROFILE_DETAIL.PERIOD_NAME FROM TBL_TIMING_PROFILE_DETAIL  WHERE TBL_TIMING_PROFILE_DETAIL.ID = GNPD.TIME_PERIOD
)
WHERE GNPD.REPREQ = VAR_REPREQ;

COMMIT;
  
  PKG_GAP_NIIM.PRC_GAP_NIIM_taAhodi_VALUE();
  DATE_TYPE1:=trunc(sysdate);
  FOR j IN
  (SELECT TTPD.ID ,
    TTP.TYPE ,
    TTPD.PERIOD_NAME ,
    TTPD.PERIOD_DATE ,
    TTPD.PERIOD_START ,
    TTPD.PERIOD_END ,
    TTPD.PERIOD_COLOR
  FROM TBL_TIMING_PROFILE TTP ,
    TBL_TIMING_PROFILE_DETAIL TTPD
  WHERE TTP.ID = TTPD.REF_TIMING_PROFILE
  AND TTP.ID   = ID_TIMING
  
  )
  LOOP
  
select count (*) into var_2111_nabashe from tbl_gap_niim_profile_detail where repreq = VAR_REPREQ and time_period = j.id and modality_type = 21 and SENS_TYPE=1 AND TASIR_NAME = I.name ;
if( var_2111_nabashe = 0) then
INSERT /*+ APPEND PARALLEL(auto)   */ INTO TBL_GAP_NIIM_PROFILE_DETAIL (
   NAME
  ,REF_REPORT
  ,REPREQ
  ,LEDGER_CODE
  ,BALANCE
  ,TIME_PERIOD
  ,MODALITY_TYPE
  ,SENS_TYPE
     ,TASIR_NAME
  )
  select 'no_name',INPAR_ID_REPORT,VAR_REPREQ,0,0,j.id,21,1 ,i.name from dual;
end if;
select count (*) into var_2111_nabashe from tbl_gap_niim_profile_detail where repreq = VAR_REPREQ and time_period = j.id and modality_type = 11 and SENS_TYPE=1 AND TASIR_NAME = I.name ;
  if( var_2111_nabashe = 0) then
INSERT /*+ APPEND PARALLEL(auto)   */ INTO TBL_GAP_NIIM_PROFILE_DETAIL (
   NAME
  ,REF_REPORT
  ,REPREQ
  ,LEDGER_CODE
  ,BALANCE
  ,TIME_PERIOD
  ,MODALITY_TYPE
  ,SENS_TYPE
  ,TASIR_NAME
  )
  select 'no_name',INPAR_ID_REPORT,VAR_REPREQ,0,0,j.id,11,1 ,i.name from dual;
  end if;

    IF ( j.TYPE = 1 ) THEN
      /******agar profile zamani entekhab shode bazehee bashad *****--*/
      SELECT '  
 INSERT /*+ APPEND PARALLEL(auto)   */ INTO TBL_GAP_NIIM_PROFILE_DETAIL (
   NAME
  ,REF_REPORT
  ,REPREQ
  ,LEDGER_CODE
  ,BALANCE
  ,TIME_PERIOD
  ,MODALITY_TYPE
  ,sens_type
  ,TASIR_NAME
  )
  SELECT /*+   PARALLEL(auto)   */ null,'||INPAR_ID_REPORT||','||VAR_REPREQ||',null,sum(gap_rate),
''' ||
     j.ID ||
     ''',111,1,'''||i.name||'''
FROM TBL_GAP_NIIM_VALUE WHERE type = 11  AND eff_date > to_date('''
        || DATE_TYPE1
        || ''',''dd-mm-yyyy'''''') and eff_date <= to_date('''
        || DATE_TYPE1
        || ''',''dd-mm-yyyy'''''')+'
        || j.PERIOD_DATE
        || '  ;'
      INTO VAR_QUERY
      FROM DUAL;
      DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(VAR_QUERY);
      EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'BEGIN ' || VAR_QUERY || ' END;';
      COMMIT;
      SELECT '  
 INSERT /*+ APPEND PARALLEL(auto)   */ INTO TBL_GAP_NIIM_PROFILE_DETAIL (
   NAME
  ,REF_REPORT
  ,REPREQ
  ,LEDGER_CODE
  ,BALANCE
  ,TIME_PERIOD
  ,MODALITY_TYPE
  ,sens_type
  ,TASIR_NAME
  )
  SELECT /*+   PARALLEL(auto)   */ null,'||INPAR_ID_REPORT||','||VAR_REPREQ||',null,sum(gap_rate),
''' ||
     j.ID ||
     ''',211,1,'''||i.name||'''
FROM TBL_GAP_NIIM_VALUE WHERE type = 21  AND eff_date > to_date('''
        || DATE_TYPE1
        || ''',''dd-mm-yyyy'''''') and eff_date <= to_date('''
        || DATE_TYPE1
        || ''',''dd-mm-yyyy'''''')+'
        || j.PERIOD_DATE
        || '  ;'
      INTO VAR_QUERY
      FROM DUAL;
      DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(VAR_QUERY);
      EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'BEGIN ' || VAR_QUERY || ' END;';
      COMMIT;

      ------/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\//\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/
      

      
      DATE_TYPE1 := DATE_TYPE1 + TO_NUMBER(j.PERIOD_DATE);
      
      
    ELSE
      /******agar profile zamani entekhab shode tarikhi bashad *****--*/
      SELECT '  
 INSERT /*+ APPEND PARALLEL(auto)   */ INTO TBL_GAP_NIIM_PROFILE_DETAIL (
   NAME
  ,REF_REPORT
  ,REPREQ
  ,LEDGER_CODE
  ,BALANCE
  ,TIME_PERIOD
  ,MODALITY_TYPE
  ,sens_type
  ,TASIR_NAME
  )
  SELECT /*+   PARALLEL(auto)   */ null,'||INPAR_ID_REPORT||','||VAR_REPREQ||',null,sum(gap_rate),
''' ||
     j.ID ||
     ''',111,1,'''||i.name||'''
FROM TBL_GAP_NIIM_VALUE WHERE type = 11 AND eff_date > to_date(''' ||
     j.PERIOD_START ||
     ''',''dd-mm-yyyy'') and eff_date <= to_date(''' ||
     j.PERIOD_END ||
     ''',''dd-mm-yyyy'') ;'
      INTO VAR_QUERY
      FROM DUAL;
      EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'BEGIN ' || VAR_QUERY || ' END;';
      COMMIT;
      SELECT '  
    INSERT /*+ APPEND PARALLEL(auto)   */ INTO TBL_GAP_NIIM_PROFILE_DETAIL (
   NAME
  ,REF_REPORT
  ,REPREQ
  ,LEDGER_CODE
  ,BALANCE
  ,TIME_PERIOD
  ,MODALITY_TYPE
  ,sens_type
  ,TASIR_NAME
  )
  SELECT /*+   PARALLEL(auto)   */ null,'||INPAR_ID_REPORT||','||VAR_REPREQ||',null,sum(gap_rate),
''' ||
     j.ID ||
     ''',211,1,'''||i.name||'''
FROM TBL_GAP_NIIM_VALUE WHERE type = 21 AND eff_date > to_date(''' ||
     j.PERIOD_START ||
     ''',''dd-mm-yyyy'') and eff_date <= to_date(''' ||
     j.PERIOD_END ||
     ''',''dd-mm-yyyy'') ;'
      INTO VAR_QUERY
      FROM DUAL;
            

      EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'BEGIN ' || VAR_QUERY || ' END;';
  end if;
  end loop;
  end loop;



 end;

    REF_REPREQ   = 1392 and name in ('TDC'  ,'VT'  )
 )
  PIVOT ( SUM ( BALANCE )
   FOR NAME
   IN ( 'TDC' as "TDC",'VT' as "VT" )
  )
  order by type,DURATION_PRIORITY;*/
  
  
  
  
  
 /* 
  select balance from TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST  where name = 'V' and REF_REPREQ = 1392; 

  INSERT
INTO TBL_COM_LEGAL_DEPOSIT_RATE
  (
    DEPOSIT_TYPE,
    RATE,
    REWARD_RATE
  )
  (
  select distinct ref_deposit_type,case when modality_type = 2 then 0.08 else 0.103 end,case when modality_type = 2 then 0.08*0.01 else 0.103*0.01 end  from akin.tbl_deposit);
*/
END PKG_COM;

 PROCEDURE PRC_COM_DELETE_REPORT (
  INPAR_ID   IN VARCHAR2
 ,OUTPAR     OUT VARCHAR2
 )
  AS
 BEGIN
  DELETE FROM TBL_REPORT WHERE ID   = INPAR_ID;

  COMMIT;
 END PRC_COM_DELETE_REPORT;
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/

 PROCEDURE PRC_COM_CREATE_REPORT (
  INPAR_NAME               IN VARCHAR2
 ,INPAR_DES                IN VARCHAR2
 ,INPAR_REF_USER           IN VARCHAR2
 ,INPAR_STATUS             IN VARCHAR2
 ,INPAR_INSERT_OR_UPDATE   IN VARCHAR2
 ,INPAR_ID                 IN VARCHAR2
 ,INPAR_TYPE               IN VARCHAR2
 ,INPAR_BRANCH             IN VARCHAR2
 ,INPAR_DEPOSIT            IN VARCHAR2
 ,INPAR_CUSTOMER           IN VARCHAR2
 ,INPAR_FIRST_DATE         IN VARCHAR2
 ,INPAR_BAZEH              IN VARCHAR2
 ,INPAR_CURRENCY           IN VARCHAR2
 ,OUTPAR_ID                OUT VARCHAR2
 )
  AS
 BEGIN
  IF
   ( INPAR_INSERT_OR_UPDATE = 0 )
  THEN
   INSERT INTO TBL_REPORT (
    NAME
   ,DES
   ,CREATE_DATE
   ,REF_USER
   ,STATUS
   ,CATEGORY
   ,TYPE
   ,REF_DEP_PROFILE
   ,REF_CUS_PROFILE
   ,REF_BRN_PROFILE
   ,FIRST_DATE
   ,BAZEH
   ,REF_CUR_PROFILE
   ) VALUES (
    INPAR_NAME
   ,INPAR_DES
   ,SYSDATE
   ,INPAR_REF_USER
   ,INPAR_STATUS
   ,'com2'
   ,INPAR_TYPE
   ,INPAR_DEPOSIT
   ,INPAR_CUSTOMER
   ,INPAR_BRANCH
   ,INPAR_FIRST_DATE
   ,INPAR_BAZEH
   ,INPAR_CURRENCY
   );

   COMMIT;
   SELECT
    ID
   INTO
    OUTPAR_ID
   FROM TBL_REPORT
   WHERE CREATE_DATE   = (
      SELECT
       MAX(CREATE_DATE)
      FROM TBL_REPORT
     )
    AND
     ID            = (
      SELECT
       MAX(ID)
      FROM TBL_REPORT
     );
     
     
       UPDATE TBL_REPORT
   SET
    H_ID = OUTPAR_ID
   WHERE CREATE_DATE   = (
      SELECT
       MAX(CREATE_DATE)
      FROM TBL_REPORT
     )
    AND
     ID            = (
      SELECT
       MAX(ID)
      FROM TBL_REPORT
     );

  COMMIT;
     
     
     

  ELSE
   UPDATE TBL_REPORT
    SET
     NAME = INPAR_NAME
    ,DES = INPAR_DES
    ,REF_USER = INPAR_REF_USER
    ,STATUS = INPAR_STATUS
    ,TYPE = INPAR_TYPE
    ,REF_DEP_PROFILE = INPAR_DEPOSIT
    ,REF_CUS_PROFILE = INPAR_CUSTOMER
    ,REF_BRN_PROFILE = INPAR_BRANCH
    ,FIRST_DATE = INPAR_FIRST_DATE
    ,BAZEH = INPAR_BAZEH
    ,REF_CUR_PROFILE = INPAR_CURRENCY
   WHERE ID   = INPAR_ID;

   COMMIT;
  END IF;

--  UPDATE TBL_REPORT
--   SET
--    H_ID = ID
--  WHERE TYPE   = 'COM2'
--   AND
--    H_ID IS NULL;

  COMMIT;
 END PRC_COM_CREATE_REPORT;

/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/

 PROCEDURE PRC_COM_FILL_SCALE AS
  VAR_SUM   NUMBER;
 BEGIN
  EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'truncate table TBL_COM_SCALE';
  SELECT
   SUM(BALANCE)
  INTO
   VAR_SUM
  FROM AKIN.TBL_DEPOSIT;

  INSERT
    /*+ APPEND PARALLEL(auto)   */ INTO TBL_COM_SCALE ( DEP_ID,BRANCH_ID,SCALE_TO_TOTAL ) ( SELECT
        /*+   PARALLEL(auto)   */
   DEP_ID
  ,REF_BRANCH
  ,BALANCE / VAR_SUM
  FROM AKIN.TBL_DEPOSIT
  );

  COMMIT;
 END PRC_COM_FILL_SCALE;
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/

 PROCEDURE PRC_COM_LEDGER_TYPE_MAIN
  AS
 BEGIN
  EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'truncate table TBL_COM_LEDGER_TYPE_MAIN';
  INSERT  /*+   PARALLEL(auto) */ INTO TBL_COM_LEDGER_TYPE_MAIN ( EFF_DATE,AMOUNT,TYPE ) SELECT  /*+   PARALLEL(auto) */
   EFF_DATE
  ,SUM(BALANCE)
  ,1
  FROM TBL_LEDGER_ARCHIVE
  WHERE LEDGER_CODE IN (
    SELECT
     TBL_COM_LEDGER_TYPE.LEDGER_CODE
    FROM TBL_COM_LEDGER_TYPE
    WHERE TBL_COM_LEDGER_TYPE.TYPE   = 1
   )
  GROUP BY
   EFF_DATE
  UNION
  SELECT  /*+   PARALLEL(auto) */
   EFF_DATE
  ,SUM(BALANCE)
  ,2
  FROM TBL_LEDGER_ARCHIVE
  WHERE LEDGER_CODE IN (
    SELECT
     TBL_COM_LEDGER_TYPE.LEDGER_CODE
    FROM TBL_COM_LEDGER_TYPE
    WHERE TBL_COM_LEDGER_TYPE.TYPE   = 2
   )
  GROUP BY
   EFF_DATE;

  COMMIT;
 END PRC_COM_LEDGER_TYPE_MAIN;
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/

 PROCEDURE PRC_COM_LEDGER_TYPE (
  INPAR_LEDGER_CODE   IN NUMBER
 ,INPAR_TYPE          IN NUMBER
 )
  AS
 BEGIN
  UPDATE TBL_COM_LEDGER_TYPE
   SET
    TYPE = INPAR_TYPE
  WHERE LEDGER_CODE   = INPAR_LEDGER_CODE;

  COMMIT;
 END PRC_COM_LEDGER_TYPE;

 FUNCTION FNC_COM_LEDGER_TYPE RETURN VARCHAR2
  AS
 BEGIN
  RETURN 'SELECT id as "id",ledger_code as "code" ,type as "type",name as "name" from tbl_com_ledger_type';
 END;

 PROCEDURE PRC_COM_DIRECT_COST ( INPAR_REPORT IN NUMBER ) AS

  VAR_REPREQ             NUMBER;

  VAR_BRANCH_PROFILE     NUMBER;

  SELECT
   MAX(ID)

  SELECT

select null into VAR_CUSTOMER_PROFILE from dual;

 ,NAME

 ' ||

 ,1

     I ||

GROUP BY
 PRAGG.TBL_VALUE.REF_TYPE;'
    INTO

    FROM DUAL;

    COMMIT;

     ')  
GROUP BY
 PRAGG.TBL_VALUE.REF_TYPE;'
    INTO
     VAR_QUERY
    FROM DUAL;
   
    /*DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(VAR_QUERY);*/

    EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'BEGIN ' || VAR_QUERY || ' END;';
    COMMIT;
    
   /***********************************************************************/
   /***************************   VT   ***********************************/
   /***********************************************************************/
    SELECT
     'INSERT  /*+ APPEND PARALLEL(auto)   */ INTO TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST (
 REF_REPORT
 ,REF_REPREQ
 ,TYPE
 ,BALANCE
 ,DURATION_TYPE
 ,DURATION_PRIORITY

   /* DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(VAR_QUERY);*/

    EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'BEGIN ' || VAR_QUERY || ' END;';
    COMMIT;
    /***********************************************************************/
   /***************************   ODC   ***********************************/

    /***********************************************************************/

 REF_REPORT
 ,REF_REPREQ

 ,DURATION_TYPE

    FROM DUAL;

    EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'BEGIN ' || VAR_QUERY || ' END;';

     TO_DATE(VAR_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') + 30
    ,'yyyy-mm-dd'
    );
   END LOOP;

  ELSIF ( VAR_PERIOD = 4 ) THEN
   NULL;
  END IF;

    
   /***********************************************************************/

   /***********************************************************************/

  INSERT  /*+ APPEND PARALLEL(auto)   */ INTO TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST (

  ,REF_REPREQ
  ,TYPE
  ,BALANCE
  ,DURATION_TYPE
  ,DURATION_PRIORITY
  ,NAME
  ) SELECT

  ,SUM(BALANCE)

  COMMIT;
  
    /***********************************************************************/

  INSERT  /*+ APPEND PARALLEL(auto)   */ INTO TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST (

 FUNCTION FNC_COM_GET_REPORT_INFO ( INPAR_ID IN VARCHAR2 ) RETURN VARCHAR2 AS
  VAR2   VARCHAR2(3000);
 BEGIN
  VAR2   := 'SELECT ID as "id",
  NAME as "name",
  DES as "des",
  CREATE_DATE as "createDate",
  REF_USER as "refUser",
  STATUS as "status",
  CATEGORY as "category",

  first_date as "firstDate",
  bazeh as "bazeh",
  ref_dep_profile as "depProfile",
  
  ref_cus_profile as "cusProfile",
  ref_cur_profile as "curProfile",
  ref_brn_profile as "brnProfile"

 FROM TBL_REPORT 
where id = '
|| INPAR_ID || ' and upper(category) = ''COM2'' order by id';
  RETURN VAR2;
 END FNC_COM_GET_REPORT_INFO;

 PROCEDURE PRC_COM_final_result ( INPAR_REPORT IN NUMBER ) AS
 var_repreq number;
begin
  SELECT
   MAX(ID)
  INTO
   VAR_REPREQ
  FROM TBL_REPREQ
  WHERE REF_REPORT_ID   = INPAR_REPORT;
  
  --********************************************************************************************
  INSERT INTO tbl_com_final_result (
    ref_repreq,
    ref_report,
    value,
    sub_modality_type,
    duration_priority,
    modality_type,
    type,
    duration_type
)
    SELECT
        VAR_REPREQ,
        INPAR_REPORT,
        nvl( ( ("TDC" - ("VT" / (
            SELECT
                balance
            FROM
                tbl_com_direct_cost
            WHERE
                tbl_com_direct_cost.name = 'V'
                AND ref_repreq = VAR_REPREQ
        ) * reward_rate) ) ),0) AS value, --
        type AS sub_modality_type,
        duration_priority,
        1 AS modality,-- modat dar
        1 AS type,-- sorat
        duration_type
    FROM
        (
            SELECT
                tc.ref_report,
                tc.ref_repreq,
                tc.type,
                tc.duration_priority,
                tc.duration_type,
                tc.name,
                tc.balance,
                r.rate,
                r.reward_rate
            FROM
                tbl_com_direct_cost tc,
                (
                    SELECT
                        tbl_com_legal_deposit_rate.rate,
                        tbl_com_legal_deposit_rate.deposit_type,
                        tbl_com_legal_deposit_rate.reward_rate
                    FROM
                        tbl_com_legal_deposit_rate
                ) r
            WHERE
                tc.ref_report = INPAR_REPORT
                AND tc.ref_repreq = VAR_REPREQ
                AND tc.name IN (
                    'TDC',
                    'VT'
                )
                AND r.deposit_type = tc.type
        )
            PIVOT ( SUM ( balance )
                FOR name
                IN ( 'TDC' AS "TDC",'VT' AS "VT" )
            )
    ORDER BY
        type,
        duration_priority;
        --************************************gharz alhasane******************************************************
          INSERT INTO tbl_com_final_result (
    ref_repreq,
    ref_report,
    value,
    sub_modality_type,
    duration_priority,
    modality_type,
    type,
    duration_type
)
        SELECT
        VAR_REPREQ,
        INPAR_REPORT,
        nvl( ( ("SDC" - ("VTGH" / (
            SELECT
                balance
            FROM
                tbl_com_direct_cost
            WHERE
                tbl_com_direct_cost.name = 'V'
                AND ref_repreq = VAR_REPREQ
        ) * reward_rate) ) ),0) AS value, --
        type AS sub_modality_type,
        duration_priority,
        2 AS modality,-- gharz alhasane
        1 AS type,-- sorat
        duration_type
    FROM
        (
            SELECT
                tc.ref_report,
                tc.ref_repreq,
                tc.type,
                tc.duration_priority,
                tc.duration_type,
                tc.name,
                tc.balance,
                r.rate,
                r.reward_rate
            FROM
                tbl_com_direct_cost tc,
                (
                    SELECT
                        tbl_com_legal_deposit_rate.rate,
                        tbl_com_legal_deposit_rate.deposit_type,
                        tbl_com_legal_deposit_rate.reward_rate
                    FROM
                        tbl_com_legal_deposit_rate
                ) r
            WHERE
                tc.ref_report = INPAR_REPORT
                AND tc.ref_repreq = VAR_REPREQ
                AND tc.name IN (
                    'SDC',
                    'VTGH'
                )
                AND r.deposit_type = tc.type
        )
            PIVOT ( SUM ( balance )
                FOR name
                IN ( 'SDC' AS "SDC",'VTGH' AS "VTGH" )
            )
    ORDER BY
        type,
        duration_priority;
        
     --************************************ sayer ******************************************************
INSERT INTO tbl_com_final_result (
    ref_repreq,
    ref_report,
    value,
    sub_modality_type,
    duration_priority,
    modality_type,
    type,
    duration_type
)
        SELECT
        VAR_REPREQ,
        INPAR_REPORT,
        nvl( ( ("ODC" - ("VO" / (
            SELECT
                balance
            FROM
                tbl_com_direct_cost
            WHERE
                tbl_com_direct_cost.name = 'V'
                AND ref_repreq = VAR_REPREQ
        ) * reward_rate) ) ),0) AS value, --
        type AS sub_modality_type,
        duration_priority,
        3 AS modality,-- sayer
        1 AS type,-- sorat
        duration_type
    FROM
        (
            SELECT
                tc.ref_report,
                tc.ref_repreq,
                tc.type,
                tc.duration_priority,
                tc.duration_type,
                tc.name,
                tc.balance,
                r.rate,
                r.reward_rate
            FROM
                tbl_com_direct_cost tc,
                (
                    SELECT
                        tbl_com_legal_deposit_rate.rate,
                        tbl_com_legal_deposit_rate.deposit_type,
                        tbl_com_legal_deposit_rate.reward_rate
                    FROM
                        tbl_com_legal_deposit_rate
                ) r
            WHERE
                tc.ref_report = INPAR_REPORT
                AND tc.ref_repreq = VAR_REPREQ
                AND tc.name IN (
                    'ODC',
                    'VO'
                )
                AND r.deposit_type = tc.type
        )
            PIVOT ( SUM ( balance )
                FOR name
                IN ( 'ODC' AS "ODC",'VO' AS "VO" )
            )
    ORDER BY
        type,
        duration_priority;
        
commit;


INSERT INTO TBL_COM_FINAL_RESULT (
  REF_REPORT
 ,REF_REPREQ
 ,VALUE
 ,TYPE
 ,MODALITY_TYPE
 ,DURATION_TYPE
 ,DURATION_PRIORITY
 ,SUB_MODALITY_TYPE
)  
select INPAR_REPORT,VAR_REPREQ,sum(value),2,1,max(DURATION_TYPE),DURATION_PRIORITY,null from (
SELECT nvl( "VT"*(1-AMOUNT-rate),0) as value,type,DURATION_PRIORITY,DURATION_TYPE
 FROM (
  SELECT
   TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST.REF_REPORT
  ,TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST.REF_REPREQ
  ,TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST.TYPE
  ,TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST.DURATION_PRIORITY
  ,TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST.DURATION_TYPE
  ,TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST.NAME
  ,TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST.BALANCE
  ,TBL_COM_PREDICTION.AMOUNT
  ,TBL_COM_LEGAL_DEPOSIT_RATE.RATE
  FROM TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST,
  TBL_COM_PREDICTION,
  TBL_COM_LEGAL_DEPOSIT_RATE
  WHERE TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST.REF_REPORT   = INPAR_REPORT
   AND
    TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST.REF_REPREQ   = VAR_REPREQ and TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST.name in ('VT'  )
    and TBL_COM_PREDICTION.type_id = TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST.TYPE
    and TBL_COM_PREDICTION.duration_type = TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST.DURATION_TYPE
    and TBL_COM_PREDICTION.DU_PRIORITY = TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST.DURATION_PRIORITY
   and TBL_COM_LEGAL_DEPOSIT_RATE.DEPOSIT_TYPE =  TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST.type
 )
  PIVOT ( SUM ( BALANCE )
   FOR NAME
   IN ( 'TDC' as "TDC",'VT' as "VT" )
  )
  order by type,DURATION_PRIORITY)
  group by  DURATION_PRIORITY;
commit;
 
end;

 FUNCTION FNC_COM_final_result(inpar_repreq IN NUMBER ,inpar_type IN NUMBER ) RETURN VARCHAR2
  AS
 BEGIN
 if (inpar_type = 1) then
  RETURN '
  select a.sorat/b.makhrag as "value",a.duration_Type as "durationType",A.DURATION_PRIORITY as "durationPriority",a.SUB_MODALITY_TYPE as "subModalityType",a.MODALITY_TYPE  as "modalityType", type.NAME as "name" from (
select value as sorat,TBL_COM_FINAL_RESULT.DURATION_PRIORITY,TBL_COM_FINAL_RESULT.DURATION_TYPE,TBL_COM_FINAL_RESULT.SUB_MODALITY_TYPE,TBL_COM_FINAL_RESULT.MODALITY_TYPE from TBL_COM_FINAL_RESULT where TYPE = 1 and REF_REPREQ =   '||inpar_repreq||'

)a,(

select value as makhrag ,DURATION_PRIORITY from TBL_COM_FINAL_RESULT where TYPE = 2 and REF_REPREQ = '||inpar_repreq||'
)b

 ,
  TBL_DEPOSIT_TYPE type
WHERE A.DURATION_PRIORITY = B.DURATION_PRIORITY and type.REF_DEPOSIT_TYPE= a.SUB_MODALITY_TYPE 

  
  ';
  else 
  null;
  end if;
 END;

/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/  



END PKG_COM;

 PROCEDURE PRC_COM_DELETE_REPORT (
  INPAR_ID   IN VARCHAR2
 ,OUTPAR     OUT VARCHAR2
 )
  AS
 BEGIN
  DELETE FROM TBL_REPORT WHERE ID   = INPAR_ID;

  COMMIT;
 END PRC_COM_DELETE_REPORT;
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/

 PROCEDURE PRC_COM_CREATE_REPORT (
  INPAR_NAME               IN VARCHAR2
 ,INPAR_DES                IN VARCHAR2
 ,INPAR_REF_USER           IN VARCHAR2
 ,INPAR_STATUS             IN VARCHAR2
 ,INPAR_INSERT_OR_UPDATE   IN VARCHAR2
 ,INPAR_ID                 IN VARCHAR2
 ,INPAR_TYPE               IN VARCHAR2
 ,INPAR_BRANCH             IN VARCHAR2
 ,INPAR_DEPOSIT            IN VARCHAR2
 ,INPAR_CUSTOMER           IN VARCHAR2
 ,INPAR_FIRST_DATE         IN VARCHAR2
 ,INPAR_BAZEH              IN VARCHAR2
 ,INPAR_CURRENCY           IN VARCHAR2
 ,OUTPAR_ID                OUT VARCHAR2
 )
  AS
 BEGIN
  IF
   ( INPAR_INSERT_OR_UPDATE = 0 )
  THEN
   INSERT INTO TBL_REPORT (
    NAME
   ,DES
   ,CREATE_DATE
   ,REF_USER
   ,STATUS
   ,CATEGORY
   ,TYPE
   ,REF_DEP_PROFILE
   ,REF_CUS_PROFILE
   ,REF_BRN_PROFILE
   ,FIRST_DATE
   ,BAZEH
   ,REF_CUR_PROFILE
   ) VALUES (
    INPAR_NAME
   ,INPAR_DES
   ,SYSDATE
   ,INPAR_REF_USER
   ,INPAR_STATUS
   ,'com2'
   ,INPAR_TYPE
   ,INPAR_DEPOSIT
   ,INPAR_CUSTOMER
   ,INPAR_BRANCH
   ,INPAR_FIRST_DATE
   ,INPAR_BAZEH
   ,INPAR_CURRENCY
   );

   COMMIT;
   SELECT
    ID
   INTO
    OUTPAR_ID
   FROM TBL_REPORT
   WHERE CREATE_DATE   = (
      SELECT
       MAX(CREATE_DATE)
      FROM TBL_REPORT
     )
    AND
     ID            = (
      SELECT
       MAX(ID)
      FROM TBL_REPORT
     );
     
     
       UPDATE TBL_REPORT
   SET
    H_ID = OUTPAR_ID
   WHERE CREATE_DATE   = (
      SELECT
       MAX(CREATE_DATE)
      FROM TBL_REPORT
     )
    AND
     ID            = (
      SELECT
       MAX(ID)
      FROM TBL_REPORT
     );

  COMMIT;
     
     
     

  ELSE
   UPDATE TBL_REPORT
    SET
     NAME = INPAR_NAME
    ,DES = INPAR_DES
    ,REF_USER = INPAR_REF_USER
    ,STATUS = INPAR_STATUS
    ,TYPE = INPAR_TYPE
    ,REF_DEP_PROFILE = INPAR_DEPOSIT
    ,REF_CUS_PROFILE = INPAR_CUSTOMER
    ,REF_BRN_PROFILE = INPAR_BRANCH
    ,FIRST_DATE = INPAR_FIRST_DATE
    ,BAZEH = INPAR_BAZEH
    ,REF_CUR_PROFILE = INPAR_CURRENCY
   WHERE ID   = INPAR_ID;

   COMMIT;
  END IF;

--  UPDATE TBL_REPORT
--   SET
--    H_ID = ID
--  WHERE TYPE   = 'COM2'
--   AND
--    H_ID IS NULL;

  COMMIT;
 END PRC_COM_CREATE_REPORT;

/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/

 PROCEDURE PRC_COM_FILL_SCALE AS
  VAR_SUM   NUMBER;
 BEGIN
  EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'truncate table TBL_COM_SCALE';
  SELECT
   SUM(BALANCE)
  INTO
   VAR_SUM
  FROM AKIN.TBL_DEPOSIT;

  INSERT
    /*+ APPEND PARALLEL(auto)   */ INTO TBL_COM_SCALE ( DEP_ID,BRANCH_ID,SCALE_TO_TOTAL ) ( SELECT
        /*+   PARALLEL(auto)   */
   DEP_ID
  ,REF_BRANCH
  ,BALANCE / VAR_SUM
  FROM AKIN.TBL_DEPOSIT
  );

  COMMIT;
 END PRC_COM_FILL_SCALE;
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/

 PROCEDURE PRC_COM_LEDGER_TYPE_MAIN
  AS
 BEGIN
  EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'truncate table TBL_COM_LEDGER_TYPE_MAIN';
  INSERT  /*+   PARALLEL(auto) */ INTO TBL_COM_LEDGER_TYPE_MAIN ( EFF_DATE,AMOUNT,TYPE ) SELECT  /*+   PARALLEL(auto) */
   EFF_DATE
  ,SUM(BALANCE)
  ,1
  FROM TBL_LEDGER_ARCHIVE
  WHERE LEDGER_CODE IN (
    SELECT
     TBL_COM_LEDGER_TYPE.LEDGER_CODE
    FROM TBL_COM_LEDGER_TYPE
    WHERE TBL_COM_LEDGER_TYPE.TYPE   = 1
   )
  GROUP BY
   EFF_DATE
  UNION
  SELECT  /*+   PARALLEL(auto) */
   EFF_DATE
  ,SUM(BALANCE)
  ,2
  FROM TBL_LEDGER_ARCHIVE
  WHERE LEDGER_CODE IN (
    SELECT
     TBL_COM_LEDGER_TYPE.LEDGER_CODE
    FROM TBL_COM_LEDGER_TYPE
    WHERE TBL_COM_LEDGER_TYPE.TYPE   = 2
   )
  GROUP BY
   EFF_DATE;

  COMMIT;
 END PRC_COM_LEDGER_TYPE_MAIN;
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/

 PROCEDURE PRC_COM_LEDGER_TYPE (
  INPAR_LEDGER_CODE   IN NUMBER
 ,INPAR_TYPE          IN NUMBER
 )
  AS
 BEGIN
  UPDATE TBL_COM_LEDGER_TYPE
   SET
    TYPE = INPAR_TYPE
  WHERE LEDGER_CODE   = INPAR_LEDGER_CODE;

  COMMIT;
 END PRC_COM_LEDGER_TYPE;

/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/

 FUNCTION FNC_COM_LEDGER_TYPE RETURN VARCHAR2
  AS
 BEGIN
  RETURN 'SELECT id as "id",ledger_code as "code" ,type as "type",name as "name" from tbl_com_ledger_type';
 END;

 PROCEDURE PRC_COM_DIRECT_COST ( INPAR_REPORT IN NUMBER ) AS

  VAR_REPREQ             NUMBER;
  VAR_FIRST_DATE         VARCHAR2(1000);
  VAR_PERIOD             NUMBER;
  VAR_DEPOSIT_PROFILE    NUMBER;
  VAR_BRANCH_PROFILE     NUMBER;
  VAR_CURRENCY_PROFILE   NUMBER;
  VAR_CUSTOMER_PROFILE   NUMBER;
  VAR_QUERY              VARCHAR2(30000);
  VAR_DATE               VARCHAR2(1000);
 BEGIN
  SELECT
   MAX(ID)
  INTO
   VAR_REPREQ
  FROM TBL_REPREQ
  WHERE REF_REPORT_ID   = INPAR_REPORT;

  SELECT
   FIRST_DATE
  INTO
   VAR_FIRST_DATE
  FROM TBL_REPORT
  WHERE ID   = INPAR_REPORT;

  SELECT
   BAZEH
  INTO
   VAR_PERIOD
  FROM TBL_REPORT
  WHERE ID   = INPAR_REPORT;

  SELECT
   REF_CUR_PROFILE
  INTO
   VAR_CURRENCY_PROFILE
  FROM TBL_REPORT
  WHERE ID   = INPAR_REPORT;

--  SELECT
--   REF_CUS_PROFILE
--  INTO
--   VAR_CUSTOMER_PROFILE
--  FROM TBL_REPORT
--  WHERE ID   = INPAR_REPORT;

select null into VAR_CUSTOMER_PROFILE from dual;


  SELECT
   REF_BRN_PROFILE
  INTO
   VAR_BRANCH_PROFILE
  FROM TBL_REPORT
  WHERE ID   = INPAR_REPORT;

  SELECT
   REF_DEP_PROFILE
  INTO
   VAR_DEPOSIT_PROFILE
  FROM TBL_REPORT
  WHERE ID   = INPAR_REPORT;

  IF
   ( VAR_PERIOD = 1 )
  THEN
  /*========== daily*/
     /*=================================================================================================================================*/
   FOR I IN 0..30 LOOP
        /*=================================================================================================================================*/

   /***********************************************************************/
   /***************************   TDC   ***********************************/
   /**********************************************************************   */
    SELECT
     'INSERT  /*+ APPEND PARALLEL(auto)   */ INTO TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST (
 REF_REPORT
 ,REF_REPREQ
 ,TYPE
 ,BALANCE
 ,DURATION_TYPE
 ,DURATION_PRIORITY
 ,NAME
) SELECT /*+  PARALLEL(auto)   */
 ' ||
     INPAR_REPORT ||
     '
 ,' ||
     VAR_REPREQ ||
     '
 ,TBL_VALUE.REF_TYPE
 ,SUM(BALANCE)
 ,1
 ,' ||
     I ||
     '
 ,''TDC''
FROM PRAGG.TBL_VALUE
WHERE REF_MODALITY_TYPE          = 21
 AND
  REF_TYPE IN (
   SELECT
    REF_DEPOSIT_TYPE
   FROM PRAGG.TBL_DEPOSIT_TYPE
   WHERE REF_MODALITY_TYPE   = 1
  )
 AND
  PRAGG.TBL_VALUE.DUE_DATE   = to_date(''' ||
     VAR_FIRST_DATE ||
     ''',''yyyy-mm-dd'') + ' ||
     I ||
     '
  and 
  REF_ID IN (  
' ||
     FNC_PRIVATE_CREATE_QUERY('TBL_DEPOSIT',VAR_DEPOSIT_PROFILE) ||
     ') AND REF_CUR_ID IN ( ' ||
     FNC_PRIVATE_CREATE_QUERY('TBL_CURRENCY',VAR_CURRENCY_PROFILE) ||
     ')' ||
     ' AND REF_CUS_ID IN ( ' ||
     FNC_PRIVATE_CREATE_QUERY('TBL_CUSTOMER',VAR_CUSTOMER_PROFILE) ||
     ')' ||
     ' AND REF_BRANCH IN ( ' ||
     FNC_PRIVATE_CREATE_QUERY('TBL_BRANCH',VAR_BRANCH_PROFILE) ||
     ')  
GROUP BY
 PRAGG.TBL_VALUE.REF_TYPE;'
    INTO
     VAR_QUERY
    FROM DUAL;

    EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'BEGIN ' || VAR_QUERY || ' END;';
    COMMIT;
   /***********************************************************************/
   /***************************   VT   ***********************************/
   /**********************************************************************  */
    SELECT
     'INSERT  /*+ APPEND PARALLEL(auto)   */ INTO TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST (
 REF_REPORT
 ,REF_REPREQ
 ,TYPE
 ,BALANCE
 ,DURATION_TYPE
 ,DURATION_PRIORITY
 ,NAME

 ' ||
     INPAR_REPORT ||

 ,' ||

 ,TBL_VALUE.REF_TYPE

 ,1
 ,' ||
     I ||

FROM PRAGG.TBL_VALUE

 AND
  REF_TYPE IN (

 AND
  PRAGG.TBL_VALUE.DUE_DATE   = to_date(''' ||
     VAR_FIRST_DATE ||
     ''',''yyyy-mm-dd'') + ' ||
     I ||
     '
  and

' ||

     ')' ||

    INTO
     VAR_QUERY
    FROM DUAL;

    EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'BEGIN ' || VAR_QUERY || ' END;';

   /***********************************************************************/
   /***************************   ODC   ***********************************/
   /**********************************************************************   */

 REF_REPORT
 ,REF_REPREQ

 ' ||

    INTO

    FROM DUAL;

  ELSIF ( VAR_PERIOD = 2 ) THEN

 FUNCTION FNC_COM_GET_REPORT_INFO ( INPAR_ID IN VARCHAR2 ) RETURN VARCHAR2 AS
  VAR2   VARCHAR2(3000);
 BEGIN
  VAR2   := 'SELECT ID as "id",
  NAME as "name",
  DES as "des",
  CREATE_DATE as "createDate",
  REF_USER as "refUser",
  STATUS as "status",
  CATEGORY as "category",

  first_date as "firstDate",
  bazeh as "bazeh",
  ref_dep_profile as "depProfile",
  
  ref_cus_profile as "cusProfile",
  ref_cur_profile as "curProfile",
  ref_brn_profile as "brnProfile"

 FROM TBL_REPORT 
where id = '
|| INPAR_ID || ' and upper(category) = ''COM2'' order by id';
  RETURN VAR2;
 END FNC_COM_GET_REPORT_INFO;

 PROCEDURE PRC_COM_final_result ( INPAR_REPORT IN NUMBER ) AS
 var_repreq number;
begin
  SELECT
   MAX(ID)
  INTO
   VAR_REPREQ
  FROM TBL_REPREQ
  WHERE REF_REPORT_ID   = INPAR_REPORT;
  
  --********************************************************************************************
  INSERT INTO tbl_com_final_result (
    ref_repreq,
    ref_report,
    value,
    sub_modality_type,
    duration_priority,
    modality_type,
    type,
    duration_type
)
    SELECT
        VAR_REPREQ,
        INPAR_REPORT,
        nvl( ( ("TDC" - ("VT" / (
            SELECT
                balance
            FROM
                tbl_com_direct_cost
            WHERE
                tbl_com_direct_cost.name = 'V'
                AND ref_repreq = VAR_REPREQ
        ) * reward_rate) ) ),0) AS value, --
        type AS sub_modality_type,
        duration_priority,
        1 AS modality,-- modat dar
        1 AS type,-- sorat
        duration_type
    FROM
        (
            SELECT
                tc.ref_report,
                tc.ref_repreq,
                tc.type,
                tc.duration_priority,
                tc.duration_type,
                tc.name,
                tc.balance,
                r.rate,
                r.reward_rate
            FROM
                tbl_com_direct_cost tc,
                (
                    SELECT
                        tbl_com_legal_deposit_rate.rate,
                        tbl_com_legal_deposit_rate.deposit_type,
                        tbl_com_legal_deposit_rate.reward_rate
                    FROM
                        tbl_com_legal_deposit_rate
                ) r
            WHERE
                tc.ref_report = INPAR_REPORT
                AND tc.ref_repreq = VAR_REPREQ
                AND tc.name IN (
                    'TDC',
                    'VT'
                )
                AND r.deposit_type = tc.type
        )
            PIVOT ( SUM ( balance )
                FOR name
                IN ( 'TDC' AS "TDC",'VT' AS "VT" )
            )
    ORDER BY
        type,
        duration_priority;
        --************************************gharz alhasane******************************************************
          INSERT INTO tbl_com_final_result (
    ref_repreq,
    ref_report,
    value,
    sub_modality_type,
    duration_priority,
    modality_type,
    type,
    duration_type
)
        SELECT
        VAR_REPREQ,
        INPAR_REPORT,
        nvl( ( ("SDC" - ("VTGH" / (
            SELECT
                balance
            FROM
                tbl_com_direct_cost
            WHERE
                tbl_com_direct_cost.name = 'V'
                AND ref_repreq = VAR_REPREQ
        ) * reward_rate) ) ),0) AS value, --
        type AS sub_modality_type,
        duration_priority,
        2 AS modality,-- gharz alhasane
        1 AS type,-- sorat
        duration_type
    FROM
        (
            SELECT
                tc.ref_report,
                tc.ref_repreq,
                tc.type,
                tc.duration_priority,
                tc.duration_type,
                tc.name,
                tc.balance,
                r.rate,
                r.reward_rate
            FROM
                tbl_com_direct_cost tc,
                (
                    SELECT
                        tbl_com_legal_deposit_rate.rate,
                        tbl_com_legal_deposit_rate.deposit_type,
                        tbl_com_legal_deposit_rate.reward_rate
                    FROM
                        tbl_com_legal_deposit_rate
                ) r
            WHERE
                tc.ref_report = INPAR_REPORT
                AND tc.ref_repreq = VAR_REPREQ
                AND tc.name IN (
                    'SDC',
                    'VTGH'
                )
                AND r.deposit_type = tc.type
        )
            PIVOT ( SUM ( balance )
                FOR name
                IN ( 'SDC' AS "SDC",'VTGH' AS "VTGH" )
            )
    ORDER BY
        type,
        duration_priority;
        
     --************************************ sayer ******************************************************
INSERT INTO tbl_com_final_result (
    ref_repreq,
    ref_report,
    value,
    sub_modality_type,
    duration_priority,
    modality_type,
    type,
    duration_type
)
        SELECT
        VAR_REPREQ,
        INPAR_REPORT,
        nvl( ( ("ODC" - ("VO" / (
            SELECT
                balance
            FROM
                tbl_com_direct_cost
            WHERE
                tbl_com_direct_cost.name = 'V'
                AND ref_repreq = VAR_REPREQ
        ) * reward_rate) ) ),0) AS value, --
        type AS sub_modality_type,
        duration_priority,
        3 AS modality,-- sayer
        1 AS type,-- sorat
        duration_type
    FROM
        (
            SELECT
                tc.ref_report,
                tc.ref_repreq,
                tc.type,
                tc.duration_priority,
                tc.duration_type,
                tc.name,
                tc.balance,
                r.rate,
                r.reward_rate
            FROM
                tbl_com_direct_cost tc,
                (
                    SELECT
                        tbl_com_legal_deposit_rate.rate,
                        tbl_com_legal_deposit_rate.deposit_type,
                        tbl_com_legal_deposit_rate.reward_rate
                    FROM
                        tbl_com_legal_deposit_rate
                ) r
            WHERE
                tc.ref_report = INPAR_REPORT
                AND tc.ref_repreq = VAR_REPREQ
                AND tc.name IN (
                    'ODC',
                    'VO'
                )
                AND r.deposit_type = tc.type
        )
            PIVOT ( SUM ( balance )
                FOR name
                IN ( 'ODC' AS "ODC",'VO' AS "VO" )
            )
    ORDER BY
        type,
        duration_priority;
        
commit;


INSERT INTO TBL_COM_FINAL_RESULT (
  REF_REPORT
 ,REF_REPREQ
 ,VALUE
 ,TYPE
 ,MODALITY_TYPE
 ,DURATION_TYPE
 ,DURATION_PRIORITY
 ,SUB_MODALITY_TYPE
)  
select INPAR_REPORT,VAR_REPREQ,sum(value),2,1,max(DURATION_TYPE),DURATION_PRIORITY,null from (
SELECT nvl( "VT"*(1-AMOUNT-rate),0) as value,type,DURATION_PRIORITY,DURATION_TYPE
 FROM (
  SELECT
   TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST.REF_REPORT
  ,TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST.REF_REPREQ
  ,TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST.TYPE
  ,TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST.DURATION_PRIORITY
  ,TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST.DURATION_TYPE
  ,TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST.NAME
  ,TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST.BALANCE
  ,TBL_COM_PREDICTION.AMOUNT
  ,TBL_COM_LEGAL_DEPOSIT_RATE.RATE
  FROM TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST,
  TBL_COM_PREDICTION,
  TBL_COM_LEGAL_DEPOSIT_RATE
  WHERE TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST.REF_REPORT   = INPAR_REPORT
   AND
    TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST.REF_REPREQ   = VAR_REPREQ and TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST.name in ('VT'  )
    and TBL_COM_PREDICTION.type_id = TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST.TYPE
    and TBL_COM_PREDICTION.duration_type = TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST.DURATION_TYPE
    and TBL_COM_PREDICTION.DU_PRIORITY = TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST.DURATION_PRIORITY
   and TBL_COM_LEGAL_DEPOSIT_RATE.DEPOSIT_TYPE =  TBL_COM_DIRECT_COST.type
 )
  PIVOT ( SUM ( BALANCE )
   FOR NAME
   IN ( 'TDC' as "TDC",'VT' as "VT" )
  )
  order by type,DURATION_PRIORITY)
  group by  DURATION_PRIORITY;
commit;
 
end;

 FUNCTION FNC_COM_final_result(inpar_repreq IN NUMBER ,inpar_type IN NUMBER ) RETURN VARCHAR2
  AS
 BEGIN
 if (inpar_type = 1) then
  RETURN '
  select a.sorat/b.makhrag as "value",a.duration_Type as "durationType",A.DURATION_PRIORITY as "durationPriority",a.SUB_MODALITY_TYPE as "subModalityType",a.MODALITY_TYPE  as "modalityType", type.NAME as "name" from (
select value as sorat,TBL_COM_FINAL_RESULT.DURATION_PRIORITY,TBL_COM_FINAL_RESULT.DURATION_TYPE,TBL_COM_FINAL_RESULT.SUB_MODALITY_TYPE,TBL_COM_FINAL_RESULT.MODALITY_TYPE from TBL_COM_FINAL_RESULT where TYPE = 1 and REF_REPREQ =   '||inpar_repreq||'

)a,(

select value as makhrag ,DURATION_PRIORITY from TBL_COM_FINAL_RESULT where TYPE = 2 and REF_REPREQ = '||inpar_repreq||'
)b

 ,
  TBL_DEPOSIT_TYPE type
WHERE A.DURATION_PRIORITY = B.DURATION_PRIORITY and type.REF_DEPOSIT_TYPE= a.SUB_MODALITY_TYPE 

  
  ';
  else 
  null;
  end if;
 END;

/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/  



END PKG_COM;

CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE "PRAGG"."PKG_CONCDP" as 
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
  /*
  Package Programmers Name:  morteza.sahi & Navid.Sedigh
  Editor Name: 
  Release Date/Time:
  Edit Name: 
  Version: 1
  Category:2
  Description:   "        "     
    */
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/

FUNCTION FNC_concdp_result (inpar_type in varchar2,inpar_operation in varchar2) RETURN VARCHAR2 ; --inpar_type if 1 -> deposit , if 2 -> loan / inpar_operation if 1->rate if 2->type if 3->branch

/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/ 
end pkg_concdp;
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY "PRAGG"."PKG_CONCDP" 
AS
  /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
  /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
  /*
  Package Programmers Name:  morteza.sahi & Navid.Sedigh
  Editor Name:
  Release Date/Time:
  Edit Name:
  Version: 1
  Category:2
  Description:
                  "        "      
      inpar_type if 1 -> deposit , if 2 -> loan / inpar_operation if 1->rate if 2->type if 3->branch
  */
  /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
  /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
FUNCTION fnc_concdp_result(
    inpar_type      IN VARCHAR2,
    inpar_operation IN VARCHAR2)
  RETURN VARCHAR2
AS
BEGIN
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  IF(inpar_type        = 1) THEN
    IF(inpar_operation =1) THEN
      return 'SELECT
        /*+  PARALLEL(auto) */
        SUM(balance) AS "balance",
        COUNT(*)     AS "count",
         rate         AS "id",
         '' ''||'' ''||rate||'' ''||''''       AS "name"
      FROM akin.tbl_deposit
      GROUP BY rate';
    elsif(inpar_operation =2) THEN
      return 'SELECT
        /*+  PARALLEL(auto) */
        SUM(TD.balance)     AS "balance",
        COUNT(*)            AS "count",
        TD.ref_deposit_type AS "id",
        MAX(tdp.NAME)       AS "name"
      FROM akin.tbl_deposit TD,
        PRAGG.tbl_deposit_type TDP
      WHERE td.ref_deposit_type = tdp.ref_deposit_type
      GROUP BY TD.ref_deposit_type';
    elsif (inpar_operation = 3) THEN
      return 'SELECT
        /*+  PARALLEL(auto) */
        SUM(td.balance) AS "balance",
        COUNT(*)        AS "count",
        td.ref_branch   AS "id",
        MAX(tb.NAME)    AS "name"
      FROM akin.tbl_deposit td,
        PRAGG.tbl_branch tb
      WHERE tb.brn_id = td.ref_branch
      GROUP BY td.ref_branch';
    END IF;
 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
  else if (inpar_type   = 2) THEN
      IF(inpar_operation = 1) THEN
        return 'SELECT
          /*+  PARALLEL(auto) */
          SUM(approved_amount) AS "balance",
          COUNT(*)             AS "count" ,
          rate                 AS "id",
         '' ''||'' ''||rate||'' ''||''''       AS "name"
        FROM akin.tbl_loan
        GROUP BY rate';
      elsif(inpar_operation = 2) THEN
       return 'SELECT
          /*+  PARALLEL(auto) */
          SUM(tl.approved_amount) AS "balance",
          COUNT(*)                AS "count",
          tl.ref_loan_type        AS "id",
          MAX(tlp.NAME)           AS "name"
        FROM akin.tbl_loan tl ,
          PRAGG.tbl_loan_type tlp
        WHERE tlp.ref_loan_type = tl.ref_loan_type
        GROUP BY tl.ref_loan_type';
      elsif(inpar_operation = 3) THEN
       return 'SELECT
          /*+  PARALLEL(auto) */
          SUM(tl.approved_amount) AS "balance",
          COUNT(*)                AS "count" ,
          tl.ref_branch           AS "id",
          MAX(tb.NAME)            AS "name"
        FROM akin.tbl_loan tl,
          PRAGG.tbl_branch tb
        WHERE tb.brn_id = tl.ref_branch
        GROUP BY tl.ref_branch';
      END IF;
 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    END IF;
    end if;
 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  END fnc_concdp_result;
END pkg_concdp;

CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE "PRAGG"."PKG_CUSTOMER_RESOURCE_ANALYSIS" as 
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
  /*
  Package Programmers Name:  morteza.sahi & Navid.Sedigh
  Editor Name: 
  Release Date/Time:
  Edit Name: 
  Version: 1
  Category:2
  Bank:          "  "
  Description:   "           "     
    */
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
FUNCTION fnc_customer_analysis_result (inpar_type in varchar2,inpar_branch in varchar2 , inpar_currency in varchar2, inpar_customer_number in varchar2) 
RETURN VARCHAR2 ; --inpar_type if 1 -> deposit , if 2 -> loan 
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/

FUNCTION FNC_GET_branch RETURN VARCHAR2;

/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
FUNCTION FNC_GET_currency RETURN VARCHAR2;

/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
end pkg_customer_resource_analysis;
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY "PRAGG"."PKG_CUSTOMER_RESOURCE_ANALYSIS" as
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
  /*
  Package Programmers Name:  morteza.sahi & Navid.Sedigh
  Editor Name: 
  Release Date/Time:
  Edit Name: 
  Version: 1
  Category:2
  Bank:          "  "
  Description:   "           "     
    */
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/

function fnc_customer_analysis_result (inpar_type in varchar2,
                          inpar_branch in varchar2 ,
                          inpar_currency in varchar2,
                          inpar_customer_number in varchar2) 
return varchar2  as
  begin
    
    
    if (inpar_type = 1)
      then 
      if(inpar_branch = -1 and inpar_currency = -1)
      then
      return 'SELECT
      "id",
      
 "balance"
 ,NAME AS "name"
 ,REF_CURRENCY AS "refCurrency"
 ,REF_BRANCH AS "refBranch"
FROM (
  SELECT  /*+   PARALLEL(auto) */
  max(cus_id) as "id",
   SUM(TD.BALANCE) AS "balance"
  ,MAX(TC.NAME ||
   '' '' ||
   TC.FAMILY) AS NAME
  ,MAX(tcu.cur_name) AS REF_CURRENCY
  ,MAX(Tb.name) AS REF_BRANCH
  FROM AKIN.tbl_deposit TD
  ,    TBL_CUSTOMER TC,tbl_branch tb, tbl_currency tcu 
  WHERE TC.CUS_ID   = TD.REF_CUSTOMER
  and tb.brn_id = td.ref_branch and td.ref_currency = tcu.cur_id
  GROUP BY
   TD.REF_CUSTOMER
  ORDER BY "balance" DESC
 )
WHERE ROWNUM  <='||inpar_customer_number||'    ----- tedad    kol';
    
    
 elsif (inpar_branch = -1 and inpar_currency <> -1)
 then
 return 'SELECT
 "id",
 "balance"
 ,NAME AS "name"
 ,REF_CURRENCY AS "refCurrency"
 ,REF_BRANCH AS "refBranch"
FROM (
  SELECT  /*+   PARALLEL(auto) */
  max(cus_id) as "id",
   SUM(TD.BALANCE) AS "balance"
  ,MAX(TC.NAME ||
   '' '' ||
   TC.FAMILY) AS NAME
  ,MAX(tcu.cur_name) AS REF_CURRENCY
  ,MAX(Tb.name) AS REF_BRANCH
  FROM AKIN.tbl_deposit TD
  ,    TBL_CUSTOMER TC,tbl_branch tb, tbl_currency tcu 
  WHERE TC.CUS_ID   = TD.REF_CUSTOMER
  and tb.brn_id = td.ref_branch and td.ref_currency = tcu.cur_id
  and td.REF_CURRENCY = '||inpar_currency||'  ----- arz 
  GROUP BY
   TD.REF_CUSTOMER
  ORDER BY "balance" DESC
 )
WHERE ROWNUM <='||inpar_customer_number||'----- tedad    arz
';
 elsif (inpar_branch <> -1 and inpar_currency = -1)
 then 
 return 'SELECT
 "id",
 "balance"
 ,NAME AS "name"
 ,REF_CURRENCY AS "refCurrency"
 ,REF_BRANCH AS "refBranch"
FROM (
  SELECT  /*+   PARALLEL(auto) */
  max(cus_id) as "id",
   SUM(TD.BALANCE) AS "balance"
  ,MAX(TC.NAME ||
   '' '' ||
   TC.FAMILY) AS NAME
  ,MAX(tcu.cur_name) AS REF_CURRENCY
  ,MAX(Tb.name) AS REF_BRANCH
  FROM AKIN.tbl_deposit TD
  ,    TBL_CUSTOMER TC,tbl_branch tb, tbl_currency tcu 
  WHERE TC.CUS_ID   = TD.REF_CUSTOMER
  and tb.brn_id = td.ref_branch and td.ref_currency = tcu.cur_id
  and td.REF_BRANCH = '||inpar_branch||'  ----- branch 
  GROUP BY
   TD.REF_CUSTOMER
  ORDER BY "balance" DESC
 )
WHERE ROWNUM <='||inpar_customer_number||'----- tedad    shobe';

elsif (inpar_branch <> -1 and inpar_currency <> -1)
then
return 'SELECT
"id",
 "balance"
 ,NAME AS "name"
 ,REF_CURRENCY AS "refCurrency"
 ,REF_BRANCH AS "refBranch"
FROM (
  SELECT  /*+   PARALLEL(auto) */
  max(cus_id) as "id",
   SUM(TD.BALANCE) AS "balance"
  ,MAX(TC.NAME ||
   '' '' ||
   TC.FAMILY) AS NAME
  ,MAX(tcu.cur_name) AS REF_CURRENCY
  ,MAX(Tb.name) AS REF_BRANCH
  FROM AKIN.tbl_deposit TD
  ,    TBL_CUSTOMER TC,tbl_branch tb, tbl_currency tcu 
  WHERE TC.CUS_ID   = TD.REF_CUSTOMER
  and tb.brn_id = td.ref_branch and td.ref_currency = tcu.cur_id
  and td.REF_CURRENCY = '||inpar_currency||'  ----- arz 
  and REF_BRANCH = '||inpar_branch||'  ---------shobe 
  GROUP BY
   TD.REF_CUSTOMER
  ORDER BY "balance" DESC
 )
WHERE ROWNUM <='||inpar_customer_number||'----- tedad    arz and shobe';
end if;


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 else if (inpar_type = 2)
      then 
      if(inpar_branch = -1 and inpar_currency = -1)
      then
       return 'SELECT
       "id",
 "balance"
 ,NAME AS "name"
 ,REF_CURRENCY AS "refCurrency"
 ,REF_BRANCH AS "refBranch"
FROM (
  SELECT  /*+   PARALLEL(auto) */
  max(cus_id) as "id",
   SUM(TD.approved_amount) AS "balance"
  ,MAX(TC.NAME ||
   '' '' ||
   TC.FAMILY) AS NAME
  ,MAX(tcu.cur_name) AS REF_CURRENCY
  ,MAX(Tb.name) AS REF_BRANCH
  FROM AKIN.tbl_loan TD
  ,    TBL_CUSTOMER TC,tbl_branch tb, tbl_currency tcu 
  WHERE TC.CUS_ID   = TD.REF_CUSTOMER
  and tb.brn_id = td.ref_branch and td.ref_currency = tcu.cur_id
  GROUP BY
   TD.REF_CUSTOMER
  ORDER BY "balance" DESC
 )
WHERE ROWNUM  <='||inpar_customer_number||'    ----- tedad    kol';
    
    
 elsif (inpar_branch = -1 and inpar_currency <> -1)
 then
 return 'SELECT
 "id",
 "balance"
 ,NAME AS "name"
 ,REF_CURRENCY AS "refCurrency"
 ,REF_BRANCH AS "refBranch"
FROM (
  SELECT  /*+   PARALLEL(auto) */
  max(cus_id) as "id",
   SUM(TD.approved_amount) AS "balance"
  ,MAX(TC.NAME ||
   '' '' ||
   TC.FAMILY) AS NAME
  ,MAX(tcu.cur_name) AS REF_CURRENCY
  ,MAX(Tb.name) AS REF_BRANCH
  FROM AKIN.tbl_loan TD
  ,    TBL_CUSTOMER TC,tbl_branch tb, tbl_currency tcu 
  WHERE TC.CUS_ID   = TD.REF_CUSTOMER
  and tb.brn_id = td.ref_branch and td.ref_currency = tcu.cur_id
  and td.REF_CURRENCY = '||inpar_currency||'  ----- arz 
  GROUP BY
   TD.REF_CUSTOMER
  ORDER BY "balance" DESC
 )
WHERE ROWNUM <='||inpar_customer_number||'----- tedad    arz
';
 elsif (inpar_branch <> -1 and inpar_currency = -1)
 then 
 return 'SELECT
 "id",
 "balance"
 ,NAME AS "name"
 ,REF_CURRENCY AS "refCurrency"
 ,REF_BRANCH AS "refBranch"
FROM (
  SELECT  /*+   PARALLEL(auto) */
  max(cus_id) as "id",
   SUM(TD.approved_amount) AS "balance"
  ,MAX(TC.NAME ||
   '' '' ||
   TC.FAMILY) AS NAME
  ,MAX(tcu.cur_name) AS REF_CURRENCY
  ,MAX(Tb.name) AS REF_BRANCH
  FROM AKIN.tbl_loan TD
  ,    TBL_CUSTOMER TC,tbl_branch tb, tbl_currency tcu 
  WHERE TC.CUS_ID   = TD.REF_CUSTOMER
  and tb.brn_id = td.ref_branch and td.ref_currency = tcu.cur_id
  and td.REF_BRANCH = '||inpar_branch||'  ----- branch 
  GROUP BY
   TD.REF_CUSTOMER
  ORDER BY "balance" DESC
 )
WHERE ROWNUM <='||inpar_customer_number||'----- tedad    shobe';

elsif (inpar_branch <> -1 and inpar_currency <> -1)
then
return 'SELECT
"id",
 "balance"
 ,NAME AS "name"
 ,REF_CURRENCY AS "refCurrency"
 ,REF_BRANCH AS "refBranch"
FROM (
  SELECT  /*+   PARALLEL(auto) */
  max(cus_id) as "id",
   SUM(TD.approved_amount) AS "balance"
  ,MAX(TC.NAME ||
   '' '' ||
   TC.FAMILY) AS NAME
  ,MAX(TD.REF_CURRENCY) AS REF_CURRENCY
  ,MAX(TD.REF_BRANCH) AS REF_BRANCH
  FROM AKIN.tbl_loan  TD
  ,    TBL_CUSTOMER TC
  WHERE TC.CUS_ID   = TD.REF_CUSTOMER
  and td.REF_CURRENCY = '||inpar_currency||'  ----- arz 
  and REF_BRANCH = '||inpar_branch||'  ---------shobe 
  GROUP BY
   TD.REF_CUSTOMER
  ORDER BY "balance" DESC
 )
WHERE ROWNUM <='||inpar_customer_number||'----- tedad    arz and shobe';
end if;
end if;
end if;

  end fnc_customer_analysis_result;
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
function fnc_get_branch return varchar2 as
  begin
    return 'select brn_id as "id",name as "name" from tbl_branch  union select  -1 as "id" , '''' as "name" from dual';
    return null;
  end fnc_get_branch;
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
function fnc_get_currency return varchar2 as
  begin
    return 'select cur_id as "id" , cur_name as "name" from TBL_CURRENCY union select  -1 as "id" , '''' as "name" from dual';
  end fnc_get_currency;
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
end pkg_customer_resource_analysis;

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 else if (inpar_type = 2)
      then 
      if(inpar_branch = -1 and inpar_currency = -1)
      then
       return 'SELECT
       "id",
 "balance"
 ,NAME AS "name"
 ,REF_CURRENCY AS "refCurrency"
 ,REF_BRANCH AS "refBranch"
FROM (
  SELECT  /*+   PARALLEL(auto) */
  max(cus_id) as "id",
   SUM(TD.approved_amount) AS "balance"
  ,MAX(TC.NAME ||
   '' '' ||
   TC.FAMILY) AS NAME
  ,MAX(tcu.cur_name) AS REF_CURRENCY
  ,MAX(Tb.name) AS REF_BRANCH
  FROM AKIN.tbl_loan TD
  ,    TBL_CUSTOMER TC,tbl_branch tb, tbl_currency tcu 
  WHERE TC.CUS_ID   = TD.REF_CUSTOMER
  and tb.brn_id = td.ref_branch and td.ref_currency = tcu.cur_id
  GROUP BY
   TD.REF_CUSTOMER
  ORDER BY "balance" DESC
 )
WHERE ROWNUM  <='||inpar_customer_number||'    ----- tedad    kol';
    
    
 elsif (inpar_branch = -1 and inpar_currency <> -1)
 then
 return 'SELECT
 "id",
 "balance"
 ,NAME AS "name"
 ,REF_CURRENCY AS "refCurrency"
 ,REF_BRANCH AS "refBranch"
FROM (
  SELECT  /*+   PARALLEL(auto) */
  max(cus_id) as "id",
   SUM(TD.approved_amount) AS "balance"
  ,MAX(TC.NAME ||
   '' '' ||
   TC.FAMILY) AS NAME
  ,MAX(tcu.cur_name) AS REF_CURRENCY
  ,MAX(Tb.name) AS REF_BRANCH
  FROM AKIN.tbl_loan TD
  ,    TBL_CUSTOMER TC,tbl_branch tb, tbl_currency tcu 
  WHERE TC.CUS_ID   = TD.REF_CUSTOMER
  and tb.brn_id = td.ref_branch and td.ref_currency = tcu.cur_id
  and td.REF_CURRENCY = '||inpar_currency||'  ----- arz 
  GROUP BY
   TD.REF_CUSTOMER
  ORDER BY "balance" DESC
 )
WHERE ROWNUM <='||inpar_customer_number||'----- tedad    arz
';
 elsif (inpar_branch <> -1 and inpar_currency = -1)
 then 
 return 'SELECT
 "id",
 "balance"
 ,NAME AS "name"
 ,REF_CURRENCY AS "refCurrency"
 ,REF_BRANCH AS "refBranch"
FROM (
  SELECT  /*+   PARALLEL(auto) */
  max(cus_id) as "id",
   SUM(TD.approved_amount) AS "balance"
  ,MAX(TC.NAME ||
   '' '' ||
   TC.FAMILY) AS NAME
  ,MAX(tcu.cur_name) AS REF_CURRENCY
  ,MAX(Tb.name) AS REF_BRANCH
  FROM AKIN.tbl_loan TD
  ,    TBL_CUSTOMER TC,tbl_branch tb, tbl_currency tcu 
  WHERE TC.CUS_ID   = TD.REF_CUSTOMER
  and tb.brn_id = td.ref_branch and td.ref_currency = tcu.cur_id
  and td.REF_BRANCH = '||inpar_branch||'  ----- branch 
  GROUP BY
   TD.REF_CUSTOMER
  ORDER BY "balance" DESC
 )
WHERE ROWNUM <='||inpar_customer_number||'----- tedad    shobe';

elsif (inpar_branch <> -1 and inpar_currency <> -1)
then
return 'SELECT
"id",
 "balance"
 ,NAME AS "name"
 ,REF_CURRENCY AS "refCurrency"
 ,REF_BRANCH AS "refBranch"
FROM (
  SELECT  /*+   PARALLEL(auto) */
  max(cus_id) as "id",
   SUM(TD.approved_amount) AS "balance"
  ,MAX(TC.NAME ||
   '' '' ||
   TC.FAMILY) AS NAME
  ,MAX(TD.REF_CURRENCY) AS REF_CURRENCY
  ,MAX(TD.REF_BRANCH) AS REF_BRANCH
  FROM AKIN.tbl_loan  TD
  ,    TBL_CUSTOMER TC
  WHERE TC.CUS_ID   = TD.REF_CUSTOMER
  and td.REF_CURRENCY = '||inpar_currency||'  ----- arz 
  and REF_BRANCH = '||inpar_branch||'  ---------shobe 
  GROUP BY
   TD.REF_CUSTOMER
  ORDER BY "balance" DESC
 )
WHERE ROWNUM <='||inpar_customer_number||'----- tedad    arz and shobe';
end if;
end if;
end if;

  end fnc_customer_analysis_result;
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
function fnc_get_branch return varchar2 as
  begin
    return 'select brn_id as "id",name as "name" from tbl_branch  union select  -1 as "id" , '''' as "name" from dual';
    return null;
  end fnc_get_branch;
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
function fnc_get_currency return varchar2 as
  begin
    return 'select cur_id as "id" , cur_name as "name" from TBL_CURRENCY union select  -1 as "id" , '''' as "name" from dual';
  end fnc_get_currency;
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
end pkg_customer_resource_analysis;

CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE "PRAGG"."PKG_BRANCH_BALANCE_SHEET" AS 

/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
  FUNCTION FNC_COMPARE_BRANCH_BR_SHEET 
(
  INPAR_DATE IN VARCHAR2 
, INPAR_BR_PROFILE1 IN NUMBER 
, INPAR_DATE2 IN VARCHAR2 
, INPAR_BR_PROFILE2 IN NUMBER 
)RETURN VARCHAR2 ;
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/

END PKG_BRANCH_BALANCE_SHEET;
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY "PRAGG"."PKG_BRANCH_BALANCE_SHEET" AS

  FUNCTION FNC_COMPARE_BRANCH_BR_SHEET 
(
  INPAR_DATE IN VARCHAR2 
, INPAR_BR_PROFILE1 IN NUMBER 
, INPAR_DATE2 IN VARCHAR2 
, INPAR_BR_PROFILE2 IN NUMBER 
)RETURN VARCHAR2  AS
VAR_PARTITION1 VARCHAR2(200) := 'P'||TO_CHAR(to_date(INPAR_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'J');

VAR_PARTITION2 VARCHAR2(200):= 'P'||TO_CHAR(to_date(INPAR_DATE2,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'J');
  
  
  BEGIN
     RETURN 
'SELECT /*+  PARALLEL(auto)   */ LEDGER_CODE as "id"
 ,NAME as "text"
 ,DEPTH as "level"
 ,PARENT_CODE as "parent"
  ,nvl("1",0) "x1",nvl("2",0) "x2"
  FROM
(
 select LEDGER_CODE
 ,MAX(NAME) AS NAME
 ,MAX(DEPTH) AS DEPTH
 ,MAX(PARENT_CODE) AS PARENT_CODE
 , SUM(BALANCE) AS BALANCE,
 '||INPAR_BR_PROFILE1||' AS P
  from tbl_ledger_branch PARTITION ('||VAR_PARTITION1||') where to_date(EFF_DATE,''yyyy-mm-dd'') =to_date(to_date('''||INPAR_DATE||''',''yyyy-mm-dd''),''yyyy-mm-dd'') AND ref_branch IN ('||fnc_private_create_query('TBL_BRANCH',INPAR_BR_PROFILE1)||') GROUP BY ledger_code 
union
  select LEDGER_CODE
 ,MAX(NAME) AS NAME
 ,MAX(DEPTH) AS DEPTH
 ,MAX(PARENT_CODE) AS PARENT_CODE
 , SUM(BALANCE) AS BALANCE,
 '||INPAR_BR_PROFILE2||'+200 AS P
 from tbl_ledger_branch PARTITION ('||VAR_PARTITION2||') where to_date(EFF_DATE,''yyyy-mm-dd'') =to_date(to_date('''||inpar_date2||''',''yyyy-mm-dd''),''yyyy-mm-dd'') AND ref_branch IN ('||fnc_private_create_query('TBL_BRANCH',INPAR_BR_PROFILE2)||') GROUP BY ledger_code 
)
PIVOT
(
  max(balance)
  FOR P IN ('||INPAR_BR_PROFILE1||' as "1", '||INPAR_BR_PROFILE2||'+200 as "2")
) order by ledger_code';
   END FNC_COMPARE_BRANCH_BR_SHEET;

END PKG_BRANCH_BALANCE_SHEET;

  ,INPAR_DEP_PROFILE           IN VARCHAR2

 ,INPAR_INSERT_OR_UPDATE   IN VARCHAR2

 ,inpar_first              in varchar2 -- tarikh ijad gozaresh
  ,inpar_change_rate              in varchar2
  ,inpar_tahlil_hasasiat     in varchar2   --ke dar sotoone REF_BRN_PROFILE dar jadvale report rikhte mishavad

CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY "PRAGG"."PKG_DU_GAP_PROF" AS
  /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
  /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
    /*
    Package Programmers Name:  morteza.sahi - Navid.Sedigh
    Editor Name: 
    Release Date/Time:
    Edit Name: 
    Version: 1
    Category:2
    Description: "      "
      */
  /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
  /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
  
   PROCEDURE PRC_DU_GAP_PROF_PROFILE_REPORT (
    INPAR_NAME               IN VARCHAR2
   ,INPAR_DES                IN VARCHAR2
   ,INPAR_REF_USER           IN VARCHAR2
   ,INPAR_STATUS             IN VARCHAR2
   ,INPAR_DEP_PROFILE        IN VARCHAR2
   ,INPAR_LON_PROFILE        IN VARCHAR2
   ,INPAR_CUS_PROFILE        IN VARCHAR2
   ,INPAR_INSERT_OR_UPDATE   IN VARCHAR2
   ,INPAR_ID                 IN VARCHAR2
   ,INPAR_TYPE               IN VARCHAR2
   ,inpar_first              in varchar2
   ,inpar_change_rate        in varchar2
   ,inpar_tahlil_hasasiat     in varchar2   --ke dar sotoone REF_BRN_PROFILE dar jadvale report rikhte mishavad
   ,inpar_tasir_hasasiat      in varchar2  -- Nerkh Tasir ke dar sotoone REF_TIMING_PROFILE dar jadvale report rikhte mishavad
   ,OUTPAR_ID                OUT VARCHAR2
   )
    AS
   BEGIN
  
    IF
     ( INPAR_INSERT_OR_UPDATE = 0 )
    THEN
     INSERT INTO TBL_REPORT (
      NAME
     ,DES
     ,CREATE_DATE
     ,REF_USER
     ,STATUS
     ,REF_DEP_PROFILE
     ,REF_LON_PROFILE
     ,REF_CUS_PROFILE
     ,FIRST_DATE
     ,TYPE
     ,CATEGORY
     ,bazeh
     ,REF_TIMING_PROFILE
     ,REF_BRN_PROFILE
     ) VALUES (
      INPAR_NAME
     ,INPAR_DES
     ,SYSDATE
     ,INPAR_REF_USER
     ,INPAR_STATUS
     ,INPAR_DEP_PROFILE
     ,INPAR_LON_PROFILE
     ,INPAR_CUS_PROFILE
    -- , to_date(inpar_first,'yyyy/mm/dd')
   ,inpar_first
     ,'duration2'
     ,'duration2',
     inpar_change_rate
     ,inpar_tasir_hasasiat
     ,inpar_tahlil_hasasiat
     );
  
     COMMIT;
     SELECT
      ID
     INTO
      OUTPAR_ID
     FROM TBL_REPORT
     WHERE CREATE_DATE   = (
        SELECT
         MAX(CREATE_DATE)
        FROM TBL_REPORT
       )
      AND
       ID            = (
        SELECT
         MAX(ID)
        FROM TBL_REPORT
       );
  
     UPDATE TBL_REPORT
      SET
       H_ID = OUTPAR_ID
     WHERE ID   = OUTPAR_ID;
  
    ELSE
     UPDATE TBL_REPORT
      SET
       NAME = INPAR_NAME
      ,DES = INPAR_DES
      ,REF_USER = INPAR_REF_USER
      ,STATUS = INPAR_STATUS
      ,TYPE = INPAR_TYPE
      ,REF_DEP_PROFILE = INPAR_DEP_PROFILE
      ,REF_LON_PROFILE = INPAR_LON_PROFILE
      ,REF_CUS_PROFILE = INPAR_CUS_PROFILE
      ,FIRST_DATE      = inpar_first
      , bazeh = inpar_change_rate
    ,REF_BRN_PROFILE  = inpar_tahlil_hasasiat
    ,REF_TIMING_PROFILE = inpar_tasir_hasasiat
     WHERE ID   = INPAR_ID;
  
     COMMIT;
     
     
     
        
   --betoone vase tasir gozareshe jadid besaze
   update tbl_notifications 
   set flag = 1
   where ref_report = inpar_id;
   commit;
   
   
    END IF;
   END PRC_DU_GAP_PROF_PROFILE_REPORT;
  /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
  /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
  
   PROCEDURE PRC_DU_GAP_PROF_DELETE_REPORT (
    INPAR_ID   IN VARCHAR2
   ,OUTPAR     OUT VARCHAR2
   )
    AS
   BEGIN
    DELETE FROM TBL_REPORT WHERE ID   = INPAR_ID;
  
    COMMIT;
   END PRC_DU_GAP_PROF_DELETE_REPORT;
  /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
  /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
  
   FUNCTION FNC_DU_GAP_PROF_ALL_REPORT ( INPAR_ID IN NUMBER ) RETURN VARCHAR2 AS
    VAR2   VARCHAR2(3000);
   BEGIN
    VAR2   := 'SELECT ID as "id",
    NAME as "name",
    DES as "des",
    FIRST_DATE as "firstDate",
    CREATE_DATE as "createDate",
    REF_USER as "refUser",
    STATUS as "status",
    CATEGORY as "category",
    ref_dep_profile as "refDeposit"
                  ,REF_LON_PROFILE as "refLoan"
                  ,REF_CUS_PROFILE as "refCustomer"
                  ,bazeh as "changeRate",
                  REF_BRN_PROFILE as "tahlilHasasiat"
                  ,REF_TIMING_PROFILE as "tasir"
  FROM TBL_REPORT 
  where id = '
  || INPAR_ID || ' and upper(category) = ''DURATION2''';
    RETURN VAR2;
   END FNC_DU_GAP_PROF_ALL_REPORT;
  /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
  /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
  
   PROCEDURE PRC_DU_GAP_PROF_REPORT_VALUE (
    INPAR_REPORT    IN VARCHAR2
   ,INPAR_REP_REQ   IN VARCHAR2
   ) AS
  
    VAR_QUERY      VARCHAR2(20000);
    VAR_SEPORDE    VARCHAR2(200);
    VAR_CUSTOMER   VARCHAR2(200);
    VAR_TASHILAT   VARCHAR2(200);
    var_first      date;
    var_change_rate number;
    
    BEGIN
    EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'truncate table TBL_VALUE_TEMP';
    
    select to_date(first_date,'yyyy/mm/dd') into  var_first from tbl_report where id = inpar_report;
    
    
    
  SELECT
     ref_cus_profile
    ,ref_dep_profile
    ,ref_lon_profile
    into   VAR_CUSTOMER,VAR_SEPORDE,VAR_TASHILAT
      FROM tbl_report
        WHERE ID   = INPAR_REPORT;
  
  select max(id) into VAR_CUSTOMER from tbl_profile where h_id = VAR_CUSTOMER ;
  select max(id) into VAR_SEPORDE from tbl_profile where h_id = VAR_SEPORDE ;
  
  select max(id) into VAR_TASHILAT from tbl_profile where h_id = VAR_TASHILAT ;
  select bazeh into var_change_rate from tbl_report where ID = INPAR_REPORT;
  
  
    VAR_QUERY   := '
    insert /*+ APPEND PARALLEL(auto)   */ into tbl_value_temp ( REF_MODALITY_TYPE
   ,REF_ID
   ,BALANCE
   ,REF_BRANCH
   ,DUE_DATE
   ,REF_TYPE
   ,REF_LEGER_CODE
   ,REF_CUR_ID
   ,REF_STA_ID
   ,REF_CTY_ID
   ,REF_CUS_ID
   ,RATE)
   SELECT /*+   PARALLEL(auto)   */
   REF_MODALITY_TYPE
   ,REF_ID
   ,BALANCE
   ,REF_BRANCH
   ,DUE_DATE
   ,REF_TYPE
   ,REF_LEGER_CODE
   ,REF_CUR_ID
   ,REF_STA_ID
   ,REF_CTY_ID
   ,REF_CUS_ID
   ,RATE
  FROM TBL_VALUE
  where ref_id in (' ||
    FNC_PRIVATE_CREATE_QUERY('TBL_DEPOSIT',VAR_SEPORDE) ||
    ' )
  and   REF_CUS_ID in (' ||
    FNC_PRIVATE_CREATE_QUERY('TBL_CUSTOMER',VAR_CUSTOMER) ||
    ' );';
  
    EXECUTE IMMEDIATE ' begin ' || VAR_QUERY || ' end;';
    COMMIT;
    VAR_QUERY   := '
    insert /*+ APPEND PARALLEL(auto)   */ into tbl_value_temp ( REF_MODALITY_TYPE
   ,REF_ID
   ,BALANCE
   ,REF_BRANCH
   ,DUE_DATE
   ,REF_TYPE
   ,REF_LEGER_CODE
   ,REF_CUR_ID
   ,REF_STA_ID
   ,REF_CTY_ID
   ,REF_CUS_ID
   ,RATE)
   SELECT /*+   PARALLEL(auto)   */
   REF_MODALITY_TYPE
   ,REF_ID
   ,BALANCE
   ,REF_BRANCH
   ,DUE_DATE
   ,REF_TYPE
   ,REF_LEGER_CODE
   ,REF_CUR_ID
   ,REF_STA_ID
   ,REF_CTY_ID
   ,REF_CUS_ID
   ,RATE
  FROM TBL_VALUE
  where ref_id in (' ||
    FNC_PRIVATE_CREATE_QUERY('TBL_LOAN',VAR_TASHILAT) ||
    ' )
  and   REF_CUS_ID in (' ||
    FNC_PRIVATE_CREATE_QUERY('TBL_CUSTOMER',VAR_CUSTOMER) ||
    ' );';
  
    EXECUTE IMMEDIATE ' begin ' || VAR_QUERY || ' end;';
    COMMIT;
    INSERT /*+ APPEND PARALLEL(auto)   */ INTO TBL_DU_GAP_PROF_DETAIL (
     REF_REPORT
    ,REF_REPREQ
    ,ref_id
    ,RATE
    ,BALANCE
    ,diresh
    ,weighted_diresh,
    total_ratio
    ,type
    ,DU_GAP_TYPE
    ,REF_LEDGER_CODE
    ) SELECT
     INPAR_REPORT
    ,INPAR_REP_REQ
    ,B.ID
    ,B.RATE
    ,ABS(b.BALANCE)
    ,b.diresh
    ,B.WEIGHTed_DIRESH
    ,b.total_ratio
    ,1
    ,1
    ,b.REF_LEGER_CODE
    FROM (
     with tmp as(
  select ref_type type, REF_ID, balance x, trunc(due_date-(var_first-1)) /30 yi,rate/100 z  ,due_date, sum(balance) over (partition by ref_id) value,  REF_LEGER_CODE,count(balance) over (partition by ref_id) cnt
    from TBL_VALUE_temp 
  where REF_MODALITY_TYPE in (11,1) and trunc(due_date-(var_first-1)) >= 0
  ),tmp2 as(
  select  x ,z,type, ref_id id,(x*yi)/power(1+z, yi) surat, x/power(1+z, yi) makhraj, value, sum(value/cnt) over () total,
      REF_LEGER_CODE
  from tmp
  )
  --select *
  --from tmp2;
  select id, sum(surat)/sum(makhraj) diresh, max(value/total) total_ratio,  sum(surat)/sum(makhraj) * max(value/total) weighted_diresh , sum(x) balance, max(z) as rate ,max(type) as type,
    max(REF_LEGER_CODE) as REF_LEGER_CODE
  from tmp2
  where makhraj <> 0
  group by id
  
  
     ) B;
    COMMIT;
    
    
    
    
    INSERT /*+ APPEND PARALLEL(auto)   */ INTO TBL_DU_GAP_PROF_DETAIL (
     REF_REPORT
    ,REF_REPREQ
    ,ref_id
    ,RATE
    ,BALANCE
    ,diresh
    ,weighted_diresh,
    total_ratio
   , type
   ,DU_GAP_TYPE
    ,REF_LEDGER_CODE
    ) SELECT
     INPAR_REPORT
    ,INPAR_REP_REQ
    ,B.ID
    ,B.RATE
    ,ABS(b.BALANCE)
    ,b.diresh
    ,B.WEIGHTed_DIRESH
    ,b.total_ratio
    ,2
    ,1
     ,b.REF_LEGER_CODE
    FROM (
      
  with tmp as(
  select e.ref_type type, e.REF_ID, e.balance x, trunc(e.due_date-(var_first-1)) /30 yi,e.rate/100 z  ,e.due_date, ee.value as value, e.REF_LEGER_CODE,count(e.balance) over (partition by e.ref_id) cnt
  from tbl_value_temp e , (select ref_id,sum(balance) over (partition by ref_id) value from  tbl_value where REF_MODALITY_TYPE = 2  and trunc(due_date-(var_first-1)) >= 0 ) ee
  where e.REF_MODALITY_TYPE in (2,21) and trunc(e.due_date-(var_first-1)) >= 0 and ee.ref_id = e.ref_id
  ),tmp2 as(

  --select *

    FUNCTION FNC_GET_DU_GAP_PROF ( INPAR_REP_REQ IN NUMBER,
   inpar_du_gap_type in number ) RETURN VARCHAR2 AS
    VAR2   VARCHAR2(32000);

var_pivot varchar2(2000);

var_select varchar2(2000);
   BEGIN



 SELECT
  WMSYS.WM_CONCAT( (
   SELECT
    ''''||sens_name ||
    ''' AS "' ||
    REPLACE(sens_name,' ','_') ||
    '"'
   FROM DUAL
  ) )
into var_pivot
 FROM ( select distinct nvl(sens_name,1) as sens_name from TBL_DU_GAP_PROF_DETAIL
 WHERE REF_REPREQ           = INPAR_REP_REQ and  du_gap_type= inpar_du_gap_type)
 ;


 SELECT
  WMSYS.WM_CONCAT( (
   SELECT
    '  "' ||
    REPLACE(sens_name,' ','_') ||
    '"'
   FROM DUAL
  ) )
 INTO
  var_select
 FROM  ( select distinct nvl(sens_name,1) as sens_name from TBL_DU_GAP_PROF_DETAIL
 WHERE REF_REPREQ           = INPAR_REP_REQ and  du_gap_type= inpar_du_gap_type);



    VAR2   := '
select "mande","type","id", '||var_select||' from (
 select  to_number(balance) as "mande",  to_number(sa)   as "value" ,type as "type", id as "id" ,nvl(sens_name,1) as "sensName"  from
  (
  select  
  sa,nvl(name ,0) as id,1 as type ,balance,sens_type,sens_name from (
  SELECT REF_LEDGER_CODE as name
   ,
    SUM(weighted_diresh) AS SA,
   SUM(balance) AS balance
   ,sens_type
   ,sens_name
  FROM TBL_DU_GAP_PROF_DETAIL
  WHERE REF_REPREQ   =  ' ||
    INPAR_REP_REQ ||
    ' and du_gap_type = '||inpar_du_gap_type||' and type = 1
  GROUP BY sens_type,sens_name,REF_LEDGER_CODE )
  -- order by id
  
  
  
   union all
 

 
  select 
  sa,nvl(name ,0) as id,2,balance,sens_type,sens_name  from (
  SELECT REF_LEDGER_CODE as name
   ,
 SUM(weighted_diresh) AS SA,
   SUM(balance) AS balance
   ,sens_type,sens_name
  FROM TBL_DU_GAP_PROF_DETAIL
  WHERE REF_REPREQ   =  ' ||
    INPAR_REP_REQ ||
    ' and du_gap_type = '||inpar_du_gap_type||' and type = 2
  GROUP BY sens_type,sens_name,REF_LEDGER_CODE)  
   order by sens_type) where id <> 0  )

PIVOT
(
  sum("value")
  FOR "sensName"
  IN ('||var_pivot||')
)

   '
  ;
    RETURN VAR2;
   END FNC_GET_DU_GAP_PROF;
